name: Butterfly_Swarm_V5
author: Gert-Jan Akerboom
description: Spawns up to 5000 butterfly clones from a GLB wing model and animates their wing flapping, sinusoidal flight paths, and drift movement each frame. Configurable UI controls adjust butterfly count, random scale range, flap speed, and fly speed. Clamps Y position so butterflies never fly below ground.
